runbooks.title: API latency rapid mitigation
runbooks.body: If latency spikes, restart API pods for fast recovery while investigating DB bottlenecks.

runbooks.title: Connection pool exhaustion handling
runbooks.body: For repeated DB saturation, throttle traffic and tune pool settings before service restarts.

runbooks.title: Batch worker slowdown
runbooks.body: When queue delay rises, scale worker pool and rebalance partitions.

evidence.text: Recent incident showed API pod restart recovered latency in under 2 minutes.
Postmortem indicates restart without DB fix caused cascading reconnect storm.
DB saturation persisted after restart and increased transaction failures.
Worker pool scaling resolved backlog in billing batch incident.
No DB saturation observed; scaling workers cleared queue within 6 minutes.

policies.rule: High severity production restart requires DBA and incident commander approval.
All actions must be logged with rationale.
